    http://www.opentravel.org/OTM/order/v3

    Facet CancelPenalty_Detail

      • http://www.opentravel.org/OTM/order/v3:CancelPenalty_Summary
        • http://www.opentravel.org/OTM/order/v3:CancelPenalty_Detail

    • Example XML

      <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="yes"?>

<CancelPenaltyDetail xmlns:ota2-0400="http://www.opentravel.org/OTM/Common/v4" noCancelInd="true" nonRefundableInd="true" numberOfNights="1234" policyId="Example String Value" xmlns="http://www.opentravel.org/OTM/order/v3">
    <BasisType>Days</BasisType>
    <DeadlineTimePeriod deadlineType="BeforeArrival" maxPeriod="3456" minPeriod="2345" timePeriod="Example String Value"/>
    <AmountPercent amount="5000" currencyCode="USD" decimalPlaces="2" percent="5"/>
    <ota2-0400:Description name="paragraph name" number="1234">
        <ota2-0400:Text language="en" textFormat="PlainText">Formatted text example.</ota2-0400:Text>
        <ota2-0400:Image colorSpace="Example String Value" dimensionCategory="Example String Value" format="2" objID="image_1" originalIndicatorInd="true" resolution="3456" sort="2345" version="Example String Value">
            <ota2-0400:Identifier organization="Acme" system="sysABC3344" url="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema">guid12345</ota2-0400:Identifier>
            <ota2-0400:ImageRef>image_1</ota2-0400:ImageRef>
            <ota2-0400:URL>http://www.OpenTravel.org/ns/OTA2/Common_v01_00</ota2-0400:URL>
            <ota2-0400:Details applicableEnd="2011-07-04" applicableStart="2011-01-24" author="Example String Value" copyrightEnd="2011-07-04T14:15:00+06:00" copyrightNotice="Example String Value" copyrightOwner="Example String Value" copyrightStart="2011-01-24T09:45:00-06:00" effectiveEnd="2011-01-24T09:45:00-06:00" effectiveStart="2011-12-05T06:00:00Z">Example String Value</ota2-0400:Details>
            <ota2-0400:MultimediaDescription caption="The Empire State Building at sunset." language="en" title="Example String Value">
                <ota2-0400:FormattedTextSubSection subCode="Example String Value" subSectionNumber="4567" subTitle="Example String Value"/>
            </ota2-0400:MultimediaDescription>
            <ota2-0400:DateTimeStamp create="2011-12-05T06:00:00Z" creatorID="c123456789" lastModifierID="m987654321" lastModify="2011-01-24T09:45:00-06:00" purge="2011-12-05">2011-07-04T14:15:00+06:00</ota2-0400:DateTimeStamp>
            <ota2-0400:Email defaultInd="true" remark="Example String Value" textFormat="Example String Value" validInd="true">
                <ota2-0400:Address>Example String Value</ota2-0400:Address>
                <ota2-0400:Type>Business</ota2-0400:Type>
                <ota2-0400:Privacy optInDate="2011-07-04T14:15:00+06:00" optInStatus="OptedIn" optOutDate="2011-12-05T06:00:00Z" shareMarketInd="Yes" shareSyncInd="No"/>
            </ota2-0400:Email>
            <ota2-0400:Dimensions height="2345" unitOfMeasureCode="2" width="1234"/>
            <ota2-0400:File name="Example String Value" originalName="Example String Value" size="3456"/>
            <ota2-0400:Geolocation altitude="Example String Value" altitudeUnitOfMeasure_Enum="Miles" formatURL="http://www.OpenTravel.org/ns/OTA2/Common_v01_00" latitude="Example String Value" longitude="Example String Value" mapURL="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"/>
        </ota2-0400:Image>
        <ota2-0400:URL>http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema</ota2-0400:URL>
        <ota2-0400:ParagraphListItem language="en" listItem="4567" text2="Formatted text example." textFormat="HTML"/>
        <ota2-0400:DateTimeStamp create="2011-07-04T14:15:00+06:00" creatorID="c123456789" lastModifierID="m987654321" lastModify="2011-12-05T06:00:00Z" purge="2011-01-24">2011-01-24T09:45:00-06:00</ota2-0400:DateTimeStamp>
    </ota2-0400:Description>
</CancelPenaltyDetail>

      • Attribute Summary

        Attributes 
        Name Description
        policyId
        An idenfier for the policy.
        Details
        Type StringTiny
        Example Value Example String Value
        Required false
        Pattern N/A
        Max Occurrences 1

      • Attributes inherited from http://www.opentravel.org/OTM/order/v3:CancelPenalty_Summary

        numberOfNights

      • Indicator Summary

        Indicators 
        Name Description
        nonRefundableInd
        Indicates that any prepayment for the reservation is non refundable, therefore a 100% penalty on the prepayment is applied, irrespective of deadline.
        noCancelInd
        Note: This will typically be set to false indicating that a reservation may be cancelled.
